statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerShippingPreferences
SELECT customer_id, shipping_preference FROM CustomerShippingPreferences
SELECT * FROM CustomerShippingPreferences WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT customer_id, shipping_cost FROM CustomerShippingPreferences ORDER BY shipping_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerShippingPreferences WHERE shipping_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CustomerShippingPreferences ORDER BY shipping_cost DESC, shipping_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, shipping_preference FROM CustomerShippingPreferences WHERE shipping_cost < 100 ORDER BY shipping_cost ASC
SELECT customer_id, shipping_preference, shipping_cost FROM CustomerShippingPreferences WHERE shipping_cost BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY shipping_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, shipping_preference, shipping_cost, shipping_date FROM CustomerShippingPreferences WHERE shipping_preference = 'Express' ORDER BY shipping_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, MAX(shipping_cost) AS max_shipping_cost FROM CustomerShippingPreferences GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_shipping_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_shipping_preferences
SELECT customer_id, shipping_address, preference_date FROM customer_shipping_preferences
SELECT shipping_method, customer_id FROM customer_shipping_preferences ORDER BY preference_date DESC
SELECT shipping_address FROM customer_shipping_preferences WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT * FROM transportation_sector WHERE transportation_mode = 'Air'
SELECT customer_id, shipping_address, shipping_method, preference_date FROM customer_shipping_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_shipping_preferences WHERE preference_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, shipping_method FROM customer_shipping_preferences WHERE shipping_method = 'Express' ORDER BY preference_date DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_shipping_preferences;
SELECT sector_id, sector_name FROM transportation_sector ORDER BY sector_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, shipping_method FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT order_id, order_date, shipping_address FROM ShippingOrders;
SELECT status_id, status_description, update_timestamp FROM ShippingStatus;
SELECT preferred_delivery_time, shipping_cost FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, shipping_address, order_date FROM ShippingOrders;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT shipping_method, preferred_delivery_time FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE shipping_cost > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date, shipping_address FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT status_id, status_description, update_timestamp FROM ShippingStatus WHERE status_description LIKE '%shipped%';
SELECT customer_id, shipping_method, shipping_cost FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE shipping_method IN ('Standard', 'Express') ORDER BY shipping_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_carrier FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT option_name, option_description FROM shipping_options WHERE option_id = 3;
SELECT carrier_name AS 'Carrier Name', carrier_type AS 'Type' FROM carriers WHERE carrier_type = 'Express';
SELECT time_description FROM delivery_times WHERE time_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT shipping_option, preferred_carrier FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_delivery_time > NOW();
SELECT option_name, option_description FROM shipping_options WHERE option_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT carrier_name FROM carriers WHERE carrier_type = 'Express';
SELECT time_description FROM delivery_times ORDER BY time_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, contact_number FROM customers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status='Delivered';
SELECT company_id, company_name, location FROM shipping_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, weight, description FROM products WHERE weight > 5 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, weight FROM products WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT company_id, company_name, contact_number FROM shipping_companies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'In Transit';
